lead_paragraph: Shostakovich and Tchaikovsky, Schumann and Wolf — all were inspired by Spain, as a performance at Merkin Concert Hall demonstrates.

headline.print_headline: Inspired by Spain, Written by Everyone
headline.main: Review: New York Festival of Song’s ‘Letters From Spain,’ Some by Russians and Germans

snippet: Shostakovich and Tchaikovsky, Schumann and Wolf — all were inspired by Spain, as a performance at Merkin Concert Hall demonstrates.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews musical program Letters From Spain: A World of Song in Spanish Poetry as part of New York Festival of Song at Merkin Concert Hall.
